text: Forsbacka IK is a sports club in Forsbacka in Sweden. It was established in 1918. The club plays bandy, floorball, handball and soccer. The men's bandy team has popular been known as the "Yellow Peril" () and has played 16 seasons in the Swedish top division. between 1940 and 1967-1968. The men's bandy team has often been described as a typical "yo-yo" club that has been promoted and relegated between the top division and second division for almost 30 years. The men's soccer team has played nine seasons in the Swedish third division.Sweden 3rd level alltime table The floorball section was started in 1991. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1918 establishments in Sweden Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Floorball clubs in Sweden Category:Handball clubs in Sweden Category:Swedish football clubs
title: Forsbacka IK
